channel.title: radare2 on Hackliza
channel.description: Recent content in radare2 on Hackliza

item.title: Heap analysis with radare2
item.description: Hi everyone. In this post, I'm going to show you how radare2 can be used to perform heap analisys in the glibc. My purpose is to create a reference with examples, that shows what can be done in radare2. I do this cause I haven't found too much info about this on internet, only the heap module presentation made by n4x0r in the r2con 2016. However, I prefer text, so I'll write here the commands with examples, ready to be consulted and copypasted.
